scripts.changelog:core: cd packages/core && npx conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s
scripts.changelog:react: cd packages/react && npx conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s
scripts.verify: pnpm build && pnpm test && pnpm typecheck
scripts.release:minor: pnpm verify && pnpm changelog:core && pnpm changelog:react && pnpm release:core minor && pnpm release:react minor && pnpm publish:core && pnpm publish:react
scripts.release:patch: pnpm verify && pnpm changelog:core && pnpm changelog:react && pnpm release:core patch && pnpm release:react patch && pnpm publish:core && pnpm publish:react
